metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4104 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An invalid Polkit Authentication check and missing authentication requirements for D-Bus methods allowed any local user to configure arbitrary VPN setups. *This bug only affects Mozilla VPN on Linux. Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Mozilla VPN client for Linux < v2.16.1.

criterions.comment: mozillavpn package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
